title: Business Analyst
description:
Good day,




We have immediate opportunity for VisionPLUS Business Analyst.




Job Role: VisionPLUS BA

Job Location: Bangalore, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad

Experience- 10+ Years




About Company:

At Synechron, we believe in the power of digital to transform businesses for the better. Our global consulting firm combines creativity and innovative technology to deliver industry-leading digital solutions. Synechron’s progressive technologies and optimization strategies span end-to-end Artificial Intelligence, Consulting, Digital, Cloud & DevOps, Data, and Software Engineering, servicing an array of noteworthy financial services and technology firms. Through research and development initiatives in our FinLabs we develop solutions for modernization, from Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain to Data Science models, Digital Underwriting, mobile-first applications and more. Over the last 20+ years, our company has been honored with multiple employer awards, recognizing our commitment to our talented teams. With top clients to boast about, Synechron has a global workforce of 13,950+, and has 52 offices in 20 countries within key global markets. For more information on the company, please visit our website or LinkedIn community.




Job Description: VisionPLUS BA

Seeking a skilled Visionplus Business Analyst to gather and document business requirements, ensuring seamless integration and functionality.
The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of Visionplus modules and system integration.

Overall responsibilities:

Areas of work: BA Services
Perform Parameter setup data mapping to new platform.
Perform Functional gap analysis and data mapping.
Assist in analyzing the portfolio migration requirements (internal and client initiated), breaking down to the required level of details to drive a traceability matrix and functional solution documents.
Facilitate in tracking the portfolio migration requirements throughout the software.
Development lifecycle, ensuring that the solution, development, and testing deliver the correct coverage and scope.
Assist in documenting portfolio migration requirements clearly and concisely in the standard format.
Assist in providing work estimates when applicable.

Technical Skills:

Hands on experience on one or more of the sub-systems in Vision PLUS (CMS Posting, FAS, TRAMS, VMx) needed to solve the issues in the application.
Skills in Mainframe - JCL, COBOL, VSAM and CICS
Experience in one of the Methodologies - Waterfall, Agile Scrum, Agile Kanban
Vision Flex experience is preferrable.




If you find this this opportunity interesting kindly share your updated profile on ajit.horo@synechron.com

With below details (Mandatory)

Total Experience -

Experience as a BA in VisionPLUS-
